entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
